thread.title: Charlie Hunnam Couldn't Be Any Hotter in the King Arthur: Legend of the Sword Trailer
thread.title_full: Charlie Hunnam Couldn't Be Any Hotter in the King Arthur: Legend of the Sword Trailer

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Charlie Hunnam Couldn't Be Any Hotter in the King Arthur: Legend of the Sword Trailer
text:
King Arthur: Legend of the Sword Movie Trailer Charlie Hunnam Couldn't Be Any Hotter in the King Arthur: Legend of the Sword Trailer February 20, 2017 by Monica Sisavat 917 Shares 
The official trailer for King Arthur: Legend of the Sword has arrived, and Charlie Hunnam could not look any hotter. Not only is his buff physique on full display, but Hunnam is playing a badass medieval hero in the film, which is directed by Guy Ritchie . The actor stars alongside Jude Law , who plays Arthur's wicked uncle, Vortigern. Watch the trailer for the film, which hits theaters on May 12, above! 
TV Spot:
